name: telephonically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or uses phones or a phone system: They communicated telephonically for a few weeks before they finally met in person. The defendant failed to appear telephonically on the first day of the trial.
More examplesFewer examplesTax returns may be filed over email, telephonically, or by mail. They plan to meet telephonically today to elect a new chairperson. The poll was conducted telephonically across a sample of 1,293 households.
